APPLICATION.name: APPLICATION
APPLICATION.description:
APPLICATION is a main application file that holds general properties and functions for the whole application
It also holds the main Calculator namespace. All necessary initializations are made in init() function.

Calculator.name: Calculator
Calculator.description: Calculator submodule. It contains all calculator related properties, methods and submodules, like, Main, Trigonometry.

APPLICATION.name: APPLICATION
APPLICATION.description:
Creates objects and subobjects by using just a string in dotted notation. 
Example namespace('my.new.namespace'); will create object 'my' that contains subobject 'new', which contains 
subobject 'namespace'.

return.description:
Returs the main APPLICATION object. false if the creation failed somehow. It is called upon page load, so
all necessary initializations which cannot be called befor page load should be called in this function.

params.name: String
params.description: describing the namespace of objects separated by a dots.

params.name: And
params.description:
object to initialize each of the newly created subobject. If you add a property with all caps it will consider it as a
constant and therefore use Constants object to create new constant that cannot be changed using Firebug and console.

Constants.name: Constants
Constants.description: Lists all constants with their values in array like format. Useful in JavaScript console.

return.description: Returs true if new constant is created or false otherwise.

Main.name: Main
Main.description: Main class object for all properties and methods of the Calculator application

Trigonometry.name: Trigonometry
Trigonometry.description: Trigonometry class for all properties and methods specific for trigonometry

EventFunctions.name: EventFunctions
EventFunctions.description: Basic Events class for all needed events

classitems.description:
STANDARD is a constant of a value 1 which describes state in which the Calculator holds only basic math operations
like aritmetic operations.
classitems.name: STANDARD

classitems.description:
SCIENTIFIC is a constant of a value 2 which describes state in which the Calculator holds basic math operations
but also trigonometric, exponential, logaritmic, factorial etc...
classitems.name: SCIENTIFIC

classitems.description:
PROGRAMMER is a constant of a value 3 which describes state in which the Calculator holds basic math operations
but also binary, hexadecomal and logical operations.
classitems.name: PROGRAMMER

classitems.description: currentState is the current state of the Calculator, which can be between STANDARD(1), SCIENTIFIC(2) and PROGRAMMER(3)
classitems.name: currentState

classitems.description: A property that holds current value of the Calculator
classitems.name: currentValue

classitems.description: A property that holds memorized value
classitems.name: memoValue

classitems.description: A property showing whether digit grouping is enabled(true) or diabled(false)
classitems.name: digitGrouping

classitems.description: A property showing whether history panel is displayed(true) or hidden(false)
classitems.name: historyPanel

classitems.description: A property showing whether unit conversion panel is displayed(true) or hidden(false)
classitems.name: unitConversionPanel

classitems.description: A property showing whether date calculation panel is displayed(true) or hidden(false)
classitems.name: dateCalculationPanel

classitems.description:
Changes the state of the Calculator and displays different sets of buttons/operations 
specific to each state: STANDARD, SCIENTIFIC, PROGRAMMER
classitems.name: changeState

params.name: event
params.description: Event object holding event specific data

classitems.name: showHistoryPanel

params.description: Event object holding event specific data

classitems.description: Displays the date calculation panel

params.name: event
params.description: Event object holding event specific data

classitems.description: DEGREES is a string constant which tells the whole application that angles are in degrees format.
classitems.name: DEGREES

classitems.description: RADIANS is a string constant which tells the whole application that angles are in radian format.
classitems.name: RADIANS

classitems.description: GRADS is a string constant which tells the whole application that angles are in grads format.
classitems.name: GRADS

classitems.description: currentAngleFormat is a string variable which represents current format of angles.
classitems.name: currentAngleFormat
